entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Quispamsis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 1:22 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or periods of rain changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of a thundershower near noon. Ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
